name: Electrospiracy
description: In a world where the public believes that electricity is real, only some people like you know the truth: the discovery of electricity was just a prank and it has never existed. However, revealing that electricity has never existed will cause too much chaos. You work as an operator that cycles an elevator up and down. You have to cycle fast enough to make it seem as if electricity is real so that visitors won't be suspicious. Failure is not an option...
